mapper.select: SELECT F.*, IFNULL(C.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__clientName, IFNULL(E.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__expertName FROM `funeral` AS F LEFT JOIN `client` AS C ON F.clientId = C.id LEFT JOIN `expert` AS E ON F.expertId = E.id ORDER BY F.id DESC

SELECT F.*, IFNULL(C.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__clientName, IFNULL(E.name, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__expertName FROM `funeral` AS F LEFT JOIN `client` AS C ON F.clientId = C.id LEFT JOIN `expert` AS E ON F.expertId = E.id WHERE 1
AND F.expertId = #{expertId}
AND F.id = ( SELECT funeralId FROM funeralRelAssts WHERE assistantId = #{assistantId})
ORDER BY F.id DESC
